chart.title: Liver cancer death rate
chart.subtitle: Reported deaths from liver [cancer](#dod:cancer) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
chart.note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).

Age-standardized deaths from liver cance.titleShort: Age-standardized deaths from liver cancer in both sexes in those aged all ages per 100,000 people

Age-standardized deaths from liver cance.descriptionShort: Reported deaths from liver cancer in both sexes in those aged all ages per 100,000 people.
descriptionKey: The International Classification of Diseases (Version 10) codes that define liver cancer are C22.
